urban.complication: A large cart blocks your path. Make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw to dodge around it, or take a 10-foot detour.
A crowd blocks your way. Make a DC 10 Strength check to push through, or spend an extra 10 feet of movement.
A door or gate bars your path. Make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check to force it open.
Loose cobblestones or slippery terrain. Make a DC 10 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check to keep your footing, or fall prone.
A dog chases after you. Make a DC 10 Strength or Dexterity check to avoid it, or lose 10 feet of speed this turn.
A laundry line hangs across the street. Make a DC 10 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check to dodge under it, or spend 5 extra feet of movement.
A market stall stands in your way. Make a DC 12 Dexterity check to weave through, or take a 10-foot detour.
A low bridge or hanging sign. Make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw to duck, or take 1d4 bludgeoning damage.
Street thugs try to trip you up. Make a DC 12 Charisma (Intimidation or Persuasion) check or lose 1d4 rounds dealing with them.
An open manhole or sewer grate. Make a DC 12 Wisdom (Perception) check to notice it, or fall in.

wilderness.complication: Dense brush blocks your path. Make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check or lose 10 feet of movement.
Uneven ground. Make a DC 10 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check or fall prone.
A stream or creek crosses your path. Make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check to cross, or take a 15-foot detour.
A wild animal is startled by the chase. Make a DC 12 Wisdom (Animal Handling) check or lose 1 round dealing with it.
Heavy undergrowth. Your speed is halved this turn.
Low-hanging branches. Make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d4 bludgeoning damage.
A hidden burrow hole. Make a DC 12 Wisdom (Perception) check or fall prone and take 1d4 damage.
A thorny hedge. Make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw to avoid it, or take 1d4 piercing damage.
A cliff or ledge. Make a DC 12 Strength (Athletics) check to climb it, or take 1d6 fall damage.
A swarm of insects. Make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks this turn.
